summary: Implemented 3-state progressive preview interaction model (OFF -> SWITCH -> FOCUS -> BUFFER_OPEN) for himalaya email module. Added handle_enter(), toggle_selection(), and created new email_reader.lua module.

artifacts.summary: Added PREVIEW_STATE enum, state transitions, focus keymaps, and window close handlers
Implemented handle_enter() and toggle_selection() functions, added CursorMoved handler for SWITCH mode
Added ESC keymap handler for state regression in sidebar
New module for full buffer email viewing with reply/forward/delete keymaps
Complete implementation summary with all changes documented

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented 3-state progressive preview interaction model for himalaya email module. First CR opens preview with j/k switching emails, second CR focuses preview with j/k scrolling, third CR opens email in full buffer. Added ESC for state regression and fixed broken selection toggle.
